key_facts: Disney's *Snow White* and *The Little Mermaid* produced high UK carbon emissions.
*Snow White* generated over 3,000 tonnes of CO₂ equivalent.
*The Little Mermaid* generated over 5,000 tonnes of CO₂ equivalent.
Disney’s combined emissions exceeded those of Birmingham and Luton airports.
Disney’s emissions surpassed those of the latest *Fast & Furious* film.
Both films were shot in the UK.
Disney received UK government subsidies for both films.
High emissions were mainly due to portable generator fuel use.
Battery-powered equipment and green electricity were used to reduce emissions.
Disney's environmental disclosures follow UK reporting rules.
Actual emissions may be higher than reported.
